tursodatabase/libsql-php.summary: Recent activities in the libsql-php repository include a refactor and fix that involved moving the FFI check and adding defaults to PDO options, which was pushed on December 26, 2024, aiming to enhance the repository's functionality and stability.

tursodatabase/turso-cli.summary: The turso-cli repository has seen a recent pull request submitted on December 26, 2024, focusing on utilizing the modern `/usage/queries` endpoint instead of the obsolete `/stats` endpoint to fetch query statistics, specifically showing query execution statistics for the last 1 day, thereby updating the command logic for improved functionality and accuracy.
